Form.TFMessage_20_Percent_1st: Your opponent's spell managed to graze you. For a small moment you are very happy that your attacker didn't hit you directly. But something is off. You shouldn't be that happy. With ease you dispel the weak mind enchantment.

Wrapping your platinum blond hairs around your finger you try figuring out what was done to you. You look down your body but nothing seems to be wrong. As you blow a bubble with your bubblegum and let it explode you suddenly know. It makes you a little bit sad but you dispel the enchantment on your mind and body, returning your hair to the normal color.

Your target dispels your enchantment just in time to prevent turning into athletic 19 year old girl. You bite back a curse knowing that you are this close to winning.

Their body becomes leaner and more athletic before your very eyes. You are nearly lost in the curves of those perky breasts and toned legs that you nearly miss when your target rushes out. With a smile you follow your victim. A 19 year old cheerleader.
